source.name: EPA's Energy Portal
source.description: Energy use is a part of everyone's daily routine. However, the generation and use of energy can affect the environment. Our regulatory and voluntary programs foster more responsible production and use of energy resources. This Web site enables you to learn more about important energy topics and locate information about our energy programs.
